detail_desc: Metal studs in various designs.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and straight-cut hem.
Top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with long raglan sleeves, a rubber print on the sleeves and back, overlocked seams for optimum comfort and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with a gathered grandad collar, buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved body in burnout-patterned jersey containing glittery threads. Deep V-neck with a knot detail at the bottom for a draping effect, a seam at the waist and a lined gusset with press studs.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, a yoke at the back, flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and an inner pocket. Adjustable tab with press-studs at the cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
Strapless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a narrow frill trim at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.

Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size (1½-3Y), twisted seams at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, lace yoke, small lace frill at the shoulders and an elasticated seam under the bust.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
V-neck T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Pool shoes with a shimmering foot strap, moulded insoles and fluted soles.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Soft socks knitted in chenille.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and dropped shoulders with a press-stud at one side. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.

Wide, block-coloured windbreaker in woven fabric. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, a zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long, wide raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a soft, ribbed cotton blend with short sleeves.
Pyjamas in a cotton weave. V-neck shirt with a collar, gathered shoulder seams and long, cuffed sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon crêpe. High collar with a drawstring at the top and bottom, a V-neck and decorative seams with piping at the front and back. Wide, raglan balloon sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs and sewn-on panels with decorative seams. Asymmetric seam at the waist with a drawstring front and back. Asymmetric, wide skirt made from panels sewn together for a softly draping effect. Raw overlocked hem. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Calf-length dress in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend with glittery threads. High neckline with a covered button at the back of the neck, an opening at the back that extends down to the waist and inset panels at the sides with narrow ties. Seams at the waist and hips and a straight skirt with width and an asymmetric edge at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Sports trousers in fabric with a slight sheen. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a zipped back pocket. Tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and a raw-edge hem.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a ribbed trim around the neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams.
Boxer shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist and fake fly.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Two elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and elastic at the hem. Medium support.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Trainers in fabric and imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
T-shirt in viscose jersey with a motif.
Joggers in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with short slits at the hems.
Fully lined one-shoulder swimsuit with a cut-out mid section and decorative knot detail at the shoulders and sides.
Blouse and puff pants in a cotton weave. Sleeveless blouse with buttons at the back and a wide flounce at the hem. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems.
Jumper knitted in a wool blend with wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
On-ear headphones with thin metal wires in the shape of cat ears. Designed to fit mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of cable approx. 115 cm.

Short, fitted dress in patterned jersey. Long puff sleeves with pleats at the shoulders and a seam at the waist. Gathered, elasticated seams down the skirt to create a gentle draping effect and a small flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Mesh bikini briefs with decorative trims, a mid waist and lined gusset. Narrow sides, high-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hat knitted in soft cotton with sewn-on ears at the top and a ribbed hem.
Fully lined bikini top in scuba fabric with wide shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 10.5 cm.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a round neckline, frill-trimmed yoke, concealed zip at the back and long sleeves with buttoned, frill-trimmed cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Mules with open toes, leather linings and insoles, and covered heels approx. 2.5 cm.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves, a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and a ribbed neckline. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Thin metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable mesh with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Dungarees in stretch twill with adjustable straps, a zipped chest pocket, fake zipped pockets at the front, real back pockets, belt loops at the waist, a zip in the side and slim legs.
Long dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif at the top and an unlined hood with a small wrapover at the front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft, pima cotton jersey with extra-long sleeves.

Coat in a soft, felted wool blend containing some cashmere. Notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole and buttons down the front. One chest pocket, flap front pockets, two inner pockets, and a single back vent. Twill lining made from recycled polyester. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Flip-flops with fabric straps and patterned soles.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in woven fabric with a gathered yoke at the front, buttons at the back of the neck and a small flounced trim over the shoulders. Lined at the top.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.

Briefs in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.
High-waisted shorts in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell with a rope-look tie belt, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Pleats at the top, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Oversized shirt in crisp cotton poplin with a pointed collar, concealed button placket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

One-button jacket in woven fabric with stretch, with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Bra in microfibre with underwired, lace-covered, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim with a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline, ribbing at the cuffs and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a square neckline front and back and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Checked scarf in a soft weave with short fringes around the edges.
Short shorts in soft imitation leather with a high waist, detachable belt with D-rings, and side pockets. Lined.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
